page.title: 17ADULTS' LEISURE
page.content: The most common pursuit shown by a small-sample questionnaire is{garden- {ing.}The relegation of{T.V. Watching} to a minority activity is interesting. We seem reluctant to admit to it. Theatre/cinema are just represented but radio doesn't even get a mention! {Reading}is included by a significant minority.{Playing sport},including modern ones like keep-fit,yoga and aerobics,and related activities like cycling and walking are popular and seen as creditable.{D.I.Y.}joins knitting and wine making.Listening to music and music making are mentioned, as is going to the Local. Both villages have{W.I.'s},{Local {History Societies}and{Whist.} A few do{Photography},one man does{ {C.B.radio}and another{collects {tractors.}A few claim they are too busy for any leisure!
